## C7082 Techniques in Machine Learning and AI

<center>

<br>

![](img/c7082-slide.png){width="400px"}

</center>

<br>

**Welcome to C7082**. This module is a survey of methods in computational AI including aspects of **neural networks and computer vision** using Keras, Tensorflow and related systems. There is an emphasis on practical applications using a series of **data examples** and **lab exercises**, along with **lectures** on selected topics and **readings**. Prerequisites are familiarity with a statistical programming language (like Python or R) and familiarity with material in the [R Stats Bootcamp](https://rstats-bootcamp.github.io/website/).

<br>

## Harper Adams Data Science
